<Heading
  as={"h1"}

  children={"Start file conversion"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/files/file/{fileId}/checkconversion"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Starts a conversion operation of a file with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"fileId","in":"path","description":"File ID","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Operation result","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"Id":{"type":"string","example":"d5490cba-a5e6-40db-acb2-94203dba12d6"},"OperationType":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","enum":["Move","Copy","Delete","Download","MarkAsRead","Import","Convert"],"description":"[0 - Move, 1 - Copy, 2 - Delete, 3 - Download, 4 - MarkAsRead, 5 - Import, 6 - Convert]","example":"6"},"Progress":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"30"},"Source":{"type":"string","example":"source"},"File":{"type":"object","properties":{"Name":{"type":"string","example":"File name"},"UpdatedBy":{"type":"object","properties":{"Id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"},"DisplayName":{"type":"string","example":"Mike Zanyatski"},"Title":{"type":"string","example":"Manager"},"AvatarSmall":{"type":"string","example":"url to small avatar"},"ProfileUrl":{"type":"string","example":"\\/Products\\/People\\/Profile.aspx?user=administrator"}},"title":"EmployeeWraper"},"Updated":{"type":"string","example":"2020-12-08T17:37:03.3424957Z"},"Location":{"type":"string","example":"4\\\\46\\\\File name"}},"title":"FileWrapper"},"Error":{"type":"string","example":""},"Processed":{"type":"string","example":"1"}},"title":"ConversationResult"}}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
